data.eml:eml: The Tenuipalpidae of Turkey, with a key to species (Acari: Trombidiformes)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Çobanoğlu, Sultan, Ueckermann, Edward Albert, Sağlam, Hayriye Didem (2016): The Tenuipalpidae of Turkey, with a key to species (Acari: Trombidiformes). Zootaxa 4097 (2): 151-186, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.2.1
